item.title: corncakes
item.description: Ingredients 2 cups corn flour 4 cups of water 1 teaspoon salt 1 pound of pork 1 onion 2 ounces of ham 3 tablespoons oil 1 pepper 1 tomato 1 teaspoon salt lard Directions Prepare a hard funche using flour, water and salt. Grind the other ingredients into the machine and add the salt. Simmer. Season at ease. On a greased banana leaf, pour two tablespoons of funche and spread it in a circle.
